Generation III.Ruby: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys . The crystalline organ on this Pok é mon 's chest appears to be its brain.
Generation III.Sapphire: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pok é mon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
Generation III.FireRed: This Deoxys has transformed into its aggressive guise. It can fool enemies by altering its appearance.
Generation III.LeafGreen: When it changes form, an aurora appears. It absorbs attacks by altering its cellular structure.
Generation III.Emerald: A Pok é mon that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.

Generation IV.Diamond: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
